alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 5:19AM CDT until June 18 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Tipton County in west Tennessee... Fayette County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 519 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dixonville to near Bartlett to near Olive Branch, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Millington, Covington, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Somerville, Brighton, Mt Pleasant, Ellendale, Dixonville, Southeast Memphis, Eads and Slayden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
